rules: Use 'Barlow Condensed' (weight 700/800) for all numeric stats and English headings.
Use 'Noto Sans Telugu' for ALL Telugu text content to ensure legibility.
Use 'Inter' for English body text and labels.
Headings must be uppercase and tracking-tight for English text.

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

layout_strategies.container: max-w-md mx-auto (Mobile-First Focus) or max-w-5xl (Desktop Dashboard)

structure.style: Sticky, Glassmorphic, High Z-Index. Contains User Profile & Settings.
Bento Grid. 3 Columns. Large 'Calories' block, smaller 'Steps' and 'Distance' blocks.
Full-width card. Line Chart dominant. Input field overlay or modal trigger.
Floating Action Button (FAB) or Fixed Bottom Bar for quick access.

cards.base: bg-card border border-white/10 rounded-xl overflow-hidden relative

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4FF00] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wide hover:bg-[#b5d900] rounded-full

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide axis lines where possible. Use Tooltips for data.

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/20 text-white focus:border-[#D4FF00] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4FF00] rounded-lg h-12

images.description: Dark moody runner for activity section background
Healthy food bowl for nutrition stats

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons (Activity, Dumbbell, Flame, MapPin).

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Do NOT break the existing 'Live Activity Tracking' feature. Wrap it in the new UI but keep logic intact.
Implement the 'Weight Tracker' with a Recharts LineChart. X-axis: Date, Y-axis: Weight.
Use the 'Neon Volt' (#D4FF00) color sparingly for high-impact data points and primary actions only.
Ensure all text is readable against the dark background. Use 'text-zinc-400' for labels and 'text-white' for values.
For Telugu text, ensure 'font-telugu' class is applied.
Create a 'GoalSetting' modal using Shadcn Dialog component.
Use 'framer-motion' for subtle entrance animations (fade-in-up) for the dashboard cards.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
